title: KHR_collision_shapes Shape Resource
description: Parameters describing a node's physics collision geometry.

anyOf.description: A sphere with a specified radius, centered at the origin in local space.
An axis-aligned box with a size per-axis, centered at the origin in local space
A capsule shape, centered at the origin in local space, equivalent to the convex hull of two spheres located along the Y axis (in local space) at a specified distance.
A cylinder shape, centered at the origin in local space, equivalent to the convex hull of two circles in the X/Z plane positioned along the Y axis at a specified distance.

sphere.description: A set of parameter values that are used to define a sphere shape.

box.description: A set of parameter values that are used to define a box shape.

capsule.description: A set of parameter values that are used to define a capsule shape.

cylinder.description: A set of parameter values that are used to define a cylinder shape.
